name: crdt-protocols
description: Protocols for encoding and decoding CRDT data.

scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:protos && npm run build:source && npm run build:clean
scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p dist build-ts && touch dist/cleanup build-ts/cleanup && rm -R dist/* build-ts/*
scripts.build:source: cp src/* build-ts/ && tsc -b && rm -R build-ts/*

author: Saul Boyd
